name: Re-Pair!
description:
You are a marriage counsellor trying to repair broken relationships. Try to use your experience and knowledge of each person's interests to find a common ground amongst the pair and revitalize their marriage!

Created for the 2020 Global Game Jam (Athens) 

Credits

Programmer: Giorgos Pagkalis
Artist: Rea Papadopetrou
Sound/Music: Denia Palaiologou
